Each Clay Mask is specially formulated to benefit a variety of unique skin types and address specific skin issues. Refer to descriptions below to find the mask just right for your skin type. Or combine colors to address specific zones.

Options are listed in order of drawing intensity from strongest to mildest.

Black - An exceptionally detoxifying and pore decongesting blend; especially suited for challenged and oil-prone skin types. Black clay, activated charcoal and palmarosa essence penetrate deeply to assist in the removal of skin-aging chemicals and toxins while sweeping away dull surface cells.

Gold - An effectively cleansing and gently exfoliating mask best suited for irritated, dry and blemish-prone skin. French yellow clay draws out impurities and mineralizes while chamomile soothes and helps to even skin tone.

Rose - A cleansing, exfoliating and balancing blend particularly beneficial for mature, dry and sensitive skin. Rose clay gently draws out toxins, oils and dirt without drying or agitating delicate skin while rosewood improves cell regeneration for smoothing of fine lines and wrinkles.

Formulated WITHOUT: Parabens, Sulfates, Artificial Fragrances, Silicones, Synthetic Dyes, Artificial Colors, Petrochemicals, & Animal Testing

Ingredients

{GOLD} - Illite (French yellow clay), Anthemis nobilis (chamomile)* flowers, essential oil of Anthemis nobilis (chamomile).{RED} - Kaolinite (Moroccan red clay), Solum Fullonum (Fuller's earth clay), Aspalathus linearis (rooibos tea) leaves*, essential oil of Cananga odorata (ylang ylang).{BLACK} - Kaolinite (black clay), activated coconut charcoal powder, Cymbopogon martinii (palmarosa) essential oil.{GREEN} -  Illite (French green clay), Lavandula spp (lavender) flowers*, Lavandula angustifolia (lavender) essential oil*.{ROSE}- Kaolinite (rose clay), rhassoul clay (Moroccan lava clay), Rosa centifolia (rose) petals*, essential oil of Aniba rosaeodora (rosewood).{WHITE} - Kaolinite (white clay), buttermilk powder*, essential oil of Citrus aurantium (neroli). *certified organic

Directions

To a small amount of powder, add liquid (try raw honey, organic yogurt, pure aloe, floral water, cold-pressed juice, tea...) and blend to achieve desired consistency; apply to skin and allow to set until dry. Remove with warm water. Please note, these masks are a dry blend of clays, herbs and essential oils. As such, they require no preservation and allow the user to add whatever liquid element they wish to constitute fresh at each or every few applications. May be refrigerated and kept fresh up to a week after liquid is added.
